verses.verse: My <WG3450> brothers, <WG80> don't <WG3361> hold <WG2192> the faith <WG4102> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> of glory <WG1391> with <WG1722> partiality. <WG4382>

For <WG1063> if <WG1437> a man <WG435> with a gold ring, <WG5554> in <WG1722> fine <WG2986> clothing, <WG2066> comes <WG1525> into <WG1519> your <WG5216> synagogue, <WG4864> and <WG1161> a poor man <WG4434> in <WG1525> filthy <WG4508> clothing <WG2066> also <WG2532> comes in; <WG1722>

and <WG2532> you pay special attention <WG1914> to <WG1909> him <WG846> who <WG3588> wears <WG5409> the fine <WG2986> clothing, <WG2066> and <WG2532> say, <WG2036> <WG846> "Sit <WG2521> <WG4771> here <WG5602> in a good place; <WG2573>" and <WG2532> you tell <WG2036> the poor <WG4434> man, <WG2476> "Stand there, <WG1563>" or <WG2228> "Sit <WG2521> <WG99999> by <WG5259> my <WG3450> footstool; <WG5286>"
haven't <WG3756> you <WG1252> shown <WG2532> partiality <WG1252> among <WG1722> yourselves, <WG1438> and <WG2532> become <WG1096> judges <WG2923> with evil <WG4190> thoughts? <WG1261>

Listen, <WG191> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> brothers. <WG80> <WG1586> Didn't <WG3756> God <WG2316> choose <WG1586> those who are poor <WG4434> in this <WG5127> world <WG2889> to be rich <WG4145> in <WG1722> faith, <WG4102> and <WG2532> heirs <WG2818> of the Kingdom <WG932> which <WG3739> he promised <WG1861> to those who <WG3588> love <WG25> him? <WG846>

But <WG1161> you <WG5210> have dishonored <WG818> the poor <WG4434> man. <WG2616> Don't <WG3756> the rich <WG4145> oppress <WG2616> you, <WG5216> and <WG2532> personally <WG846> drag <WG1670> you <WG5209> before <WG1519> the courts? <WG2922>
<WG987> Don't <WG3756> they <WG846> blaspheme <WG987> the honorable <WG2570> name <WG3686> by <WG1909> which <WG3588> you <WG5209> are called? <WG1941>

However, <WG3305> if <WG1487> you fulfill <WG5055> the royal <WG937> law, <WG3551> according to <WG2596> the Scripture, <WG1124> "You shall love <WG25> your <WG4675> neighbor <WG4139> as <WG5613> yourself, <WG4572>" you do <WG4160> well. <WG2573>
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> you show partiality, <WG4380> you commit <WG2038> sin, <WG266> being convicted <WG1651> by <WG5259> the law <WG3551> as <WG5613> transgressors. <WG3848>

For <WG1063> whoever <WG3748> keeps <WG5083> the whole <WG3650> law, <WG3551> and yet <WG1161> stumbles <WG4417> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> point, <WG1096> he has become guilty <WG1777> of all. <WG3956>

For <WG1063> he who said, <WG2036> "Do <WG3431> not <WG3361> commit adultery, <WG3431>" also <WG2532> said, <WG2036> "Do <WG5407> not <WG3361> commit murder. <WG5407>" Now <WG1161> if <WG1487> you do not <WG3756> commit <WG3431> adultery, <WG3431> but <WG1161> murder, <WG5407> you have become <WG1096> a transgressor <WG3848> of the law. <WG3551>
So <WG3779> speak, <WG2980> and <WG2532> so <WG3779> do, <WG4160> as <WG5613> men who are <WG3195> to be judged <WG2919> by <WG1223> a law <WG3551> of freedom. <WG1657>
For <WG1063> judgment <WG2920> is without mercy <WG448> to him <WG4160> who has shown <WG4160> no <WG3361> mercy. <WG1656> <WG2532> Mercy <WG1656> triumphs over <WG2620> judgment. <WG2920>

What <WG5101> good <WG3786> is it, <WG3450> my brothers, <WG80> if <WG1437> a man <WG5100> says <WG3004> he has <WG2192> faith, <WG4102> but <WG1161> has <WG2192> no <WG3361> works? <WG3361> Can <WG1410> faith <WG4102> save <WG4982> him? <WG846>
And if <WG1437> a brother <WG80> or <WG2228> sister <WG79> is <WG5225> naked <WG1131> and <WG2532> in lack <WG3007> of <WG5600> daily <WG2184> food, <WG5160>

and <WG1161> one <WG5100> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> tells <WG2036> them, <WG846> "Go <WG5217> in <WG1722> peace, <WG1515> be <WG2328> warmed <WG2328> and <WG2532> filled; <WG5526>" and <WG2532> yet <WG1161> you didn't <WG3361> give <WG1325> them <WG846> the things the body <WG4983> needs, <WG5101> what good is it? <WG3786>
Even <WG2532> so <WG3779> faith, <WG4102> if <WG1437> it has <WG2192> no <WG3361> works, <WG2041> is <WG2076> dead <WG3498> in <WG2596> itself. <WG1438>

Yes, <WG235> a man <WG5100> will say, <WG2046> "You <WG4771> have <WG2192> faith, <WG4102> and I <WG2504> have <WG2192> works. <WG2041>" Show <WG1166> me <WG3427> your <WG4675> faith <WG4102> without <WG1537> <WG4675> works, <WG2041> and I <WG2504> by <WG1537> my <WG3450> works <WG2041> will show <WG1166> you <WG4671> my <WG3450> faith. <WG4102>
You <WG4771> believe <WG4100> that <WG3754> God <WG2316> is <WG2076> one. <WG1520> You do <WG4160> well. <WG2573> The demons <WG1140> also <WG2532> believe, <WG4100> and <WG2532> shudder. <WG5425>
But <WG1161> do you want <WG2309> to know, <WG1097> <WG5599> vain <WG2756> man, <WG444> that <WG3754> faith <WG4102> apart <WG5565> from works <WG2041> is <WG2076> dead? <WG3498>

Wasn't <WG3756> Abraham <WG11> our <WG2257> father <WG3962> justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> works, <WG2041> in that he offered <WG399> up Isaac <WG2464> his <WG846> son <WG5207> on <WG1909> the altar? <WG2379>
You <WG991> see that <WG3754> faith <WG4102> worked with <WG4903> his <WG846> works, <WG2041> and <WG2532> by <WG1537> works <WG2041> faith <WG4102> was <WG5048> perfected; <WG5048>

and <WG2532> the Scripture <WG1124> was fulfilled <WG4137> which says, <WG1161> "Abraham <WG11> believed <WG4100> God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> it was accounted <WG3049> to him <WG846> as <WG1519> righteousness; <WG1343>" and <WG2532> he was called <WG2564> the friend <WG5384> of God. <WG2316>
You see <WG3708> then <WG5106> that <WG3754> by <WG1537> works, <WG2041> a man <WG444> is justified, <WG1344> and <WG2532> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> by <WG1537> faith. <WG4102>

In the same way, <WG3668> <WG1344> wasn't <WG3756> Rahab <WG4460> the prostitute <WG4204> also <WG2532> justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> works, <WG2041> in that she received <WG5264> the messengers, <WG32> and <WG2532> sent <WG1544> them out <WG1544> another <WG2087> way? <WG3598>

For <WG1063> as <WG5618> the body <WG4983> apart <WG5565> from the spirit <WG4151> is <WG2076> dead, <WG3498> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> faith <WG4102> apart <WG5565> from works <WG2041> is <WG2076> dead. <WG3498>
